ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: EverQuest Action Figures FS
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, normally I don t let ads go through, but this was for some EverQuest stuff and I figured people might be interested. And we gained more information
ygData.messageBody:
Well, normally I don't let ads go through, but this was for some EverQuest stuff and I figured people might be interested. And we gained more information because I didn't know the toys were available at Toys R Us. So people who didn't know found out from you.
Although I am still boycotting Toys R Us for being assholes to my mother and some friends.
luv,
-Su

======== At 2004-07-26, 11:38:00 you wrote: ========

1. Should they even be adverstising here?
2. Why pay 10 - 12 online (then having ot pay shipping and
handling?) You can get most of these from Toys R Us for about 4-5
each because they overstocked and undersold
